mapper.insert: insert into clazz(name, room, begin_date, end_date, master_id, subject, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{room}, #{beginDate}, #{endDate}, #{masterId}, #{subject}, now(), now())
mapper.update:
update clazz
name = #{name},
room = #{room},
begin_date = #{beginDate},
end_date = #{endDate},
master_id = #{masterId},
subject = #{subject},
update_time = now()
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from clazz order by update_time desc;
select a.name as pos, count(*) total from clazz a left join student b on a.id = b.clazz_id group by a.name
